messages.subject: Your house smells like Ren's
messages.msgSnippet: That s what I heard last night as I was cooking dinner.  We have a friend Emily s age visiting us from Mobile this weekend.  She s a delight to have (another
messages.messageBody:
That's what I heard last night as I was cooking dinner. We have a friend
Emily's age visiting us from Mobile this weekend. She's a delight to have
(another unschooler). Last night I was baking focaccia and making
spaghetti. Our friend walked into my kitchen and said, "Oh, your house
smells like Ren's!" I cocked my head not knowing if this was a good thing
or a bad thing so asked. She said, "Oh all the herbs. It smells like Ren's
kitchen when she cooks." I found that funny because I always associate tea
smells with Ren's kitchen.

I miss you Ren and your smelly kitchen!

--
Michelle
Independent Kitchen Consultant #413652
The Pampered Chef
850-474-0817
http://www.pamperedchef.biz/michellelr
Ask me how you can save 60% on some of our most favorite products!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
